attributes.action: Provide compulsory Paternity tests when a child is born.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To safeguard against men being duped into providing and caring for children when they should not be.
This should stop the extensive damage and heartache, if in future years a man finds out that a child is not his own. It is also a right step for male rights and could also help give men a more positive look on parenthood.
